content: TE-HX SC Scaling chisels Self-sharpening scaling chisels for scraping away weld spatter, formwork seepage and other residues using the third-gen TE 3000 or H28 demolition tools with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening cutting edge – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Applications Removing weld spatter, scale and concrete formwork overflow or seepage Channeling in concrete For use with third-generation TE 3000 electric jackhammers and H28 demolition tools with clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) Application: Scaling, Channeling Width: 3.1 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) | Application | Scaling, Channeling | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2254769 - Scaling chisel TE-HX SC 40/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2254770 - Scaling chisel TE-HX SC 50/8 - Package Size 1 pc
